channel.title: Bain & Co. on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bain & Co. on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AI May Bring a Flood of Cheap Content, But There’s a Silver Lining
item.description: Major media companies will need to make their content and experiences “even more premium,” concludes a report from the management consultancy Bain & Co.
